title: orders table
text:
Table: orders
Description: Stores customer purchase transactions.
Columns:
- id (int, primary key)
- customer_id (int, foreign key -> customers.id)
- total_amount (numeric) — total monetary value of the order.
- status (text) — order status; possible values: pending, paid, cancelled
- created_at (timestamp) — the order creation date (use this as the order date)
Relationships: orders.customer_id -> customers.id
Notes: Use created_at to filter orders by date ranges.
